definition: any of various primates with short tails or no tail at all, to represent in or produce a caricature of
details:
noun
- any of various primates with short tails or no tail at all
- person who resembles a nonhuman primate
= synonyms: anthropoid
- someone who copies the words or behavior of another
= synonyms: copycat, imitator, emulator, aper
verb
- to represent in or produce a caricature of
= example: to represent in or produce a caricature of
= synonyms: caricature
- to imitate uncritically and in every aspect
= example: to imitate uncritically and in every aspect
